meaningMnemonic: A <radical>child</radical> shares his <radical>lineage</radical> with a <kanji>grandchild</kanji>. The child passes his lineage down to his child and then that child’s child is the grandchild and between them all a lineage is shared.
readingMnemonic: The <reading>son</reading> (そん) of a son is a <kanji>grandchild</kanji>. In this case, a grandson. Easy.
